    Training courses

    To help the users take advantage of the LUNARC and the NAISS resources, courses are given in different topics in high performance computing.

    Scheduled courses

    The following events are currently scheduled:

    • Cluster architecture and job submission, 2 September 2025

    • An introduction to parallel programming using Message Passing with MPI, 16, 17, 23 and 24 September 2025
